The Axe06584fov6a013v9uhq0pwzn67bipj724vbgm1784772015-03-22T03:02:28ZThe Dragon Demands5014364/* References */[[Image:The Axe.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of the Axe on the continent of Essos.]]
'''The Axe''' is a region on the continent of [[Essos]], located to the east of [[Westeros]]. It is a large, axehead-shaped peninsular extending northwards into the [[Shivering Sea]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/braavos/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Braavos entry]</ref>
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Axe is a mountainous headland, an extension of the hills and mountains to the south. [[Norvos]] maintains mines in this area. Ores are taken by land down to the Darkwash River and thence to Norvos and [[Qohor]].

According to legend, the [[Andals]] inhabited the Axe before they migrated further west to [[Andalos]].
